DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether alendronate and alfacalcidol are effective on prosthetic or lumbar spine BMD after total hip arthroplasty.
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness of Two Osteoporosis Drugs on Prosthetic Bone Mineral Density (BMD) Loss After Total Hip Arthroplasty(THA)
DOC.criteria: osteoarthritis of the hip patients after total hip arthroplasty diseases related to bone metabolism patients taking drugs which affect bone metabolism
